thread.title: Naked Bengals in background of NFL Network interview
thread.title_full: Naked Bengals in background of NFL Network interview | www.ajc.com

author: Cassidy Boyer
title: Naked Bengals in background of NFL Network interview
text:
After the Bengalsâ€™ win over the Bills this afternoon, the NFL Network aired quite the graphic interview with cornerback Adam Jones.
Conducted in the locker room, several players can be seen walking around naked in the background, unnoticed by interviewer Albert Breer.
>> Read more trending stories
In an apparent oversight, the unedited interview aired live on the NFL Network earlier today, but announcers can be heard laughing in the background.
Here are a few tweets from fans who caught the segment:
@Lizzs_Lockeroom did you see this? Oops http://t.co/EqGLc7d0CO
